meanings.definition: The act of being within something.
meanings.sent1: The withing of the cat inside the box was a sight to see.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the withing of the warmth inside the cozy blanket.
meanings.sent3: The withing of the squirrel in the birdhouse was quite a surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed withing the walls of the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The withing of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The process of moving or existing within a certain space or area.
meanings.sent1: The withing of the ants through the tiny cracks was fascinating.
meanings.sent2: I observed the withing of the fish in the clear water of the pond.
meanings.sent3: The withing of the students in the crowded hallway was chaotic.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to flow withing the ancient ruins of the castle.
meanings.sent5: The withing of the clouds in the sky created a beautiful pattern.
